amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to deliver water to the Trinity River above the minimum requirements of the Trinity Record of Decision or to supplement flows in the Klamath River.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to deliver water to the Trinity River above the minimum requirements of the Trinity Record of Decision or to supplement flows in the Klamath River.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 183 (Roll no. 213).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 183 (Roll no. 213).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
